section:
Mukogawa is a city of strong gleaming ramparts built on cliffs overlooking the sea. White banners flutter and snap in the breeze and soldiers in white surcoats patrol the streets. This is the stronghold of the Moonrise Clan, whose ancestral shrine is just across the straits on Udai Island.
